title: [QUICK-WIN] Configure ESLint and Prettier
body:
## Problem
No linting configuration despite having ESLint in dependencies.

## Tasks
- [ ] Create .eslintrc configuration
- [ ] Create .prettierrc configuration
- [ ] Add pre-commit hooks
- [ ] Fix initial violations
- [ ] Add to CI pipeline

## Acceptance Criteria
- Linting configured
- Pre-commit hooks active
- CI enforces linting
- Documentation updated

## Priority: MEDIUM
## Effort: 5 story points
